introduction.section1: Southeast Asian country, surrounded by Thailand, Laos, and Vietnam.
introduction.section2: Famous for Siem Reap and the ruins of Angkor Wat, you can also sail on Tonle Sap Lake and observe the life of floating villages. In Phnom Penh, visit the royal palace and the former prison from the Khmer Rouge regime, a moving story that will make you discover Cambodia differently.
introduction.section3: Discover Cambodia through our articles and our photos.

google-description: Famous for Siem Reap and the ruins of Angkor Wat, you can also sail on Tonle Sap Lake and observe the life of floating villages. In Phnom Penh, visit the royal palace and the former prison from the Khmer Rouge regime, a moving story that will make you discover Cambodia differently. Follow our city-to-city guide to discover our selection of must-see places. Our travelogue with photos, tips, and advice.

In Phnom Penh, visit the royal palace and the former prison from the Khmer Rouge regime, a moving story that will make you discover Cambodia differently.
